lead_paragraph: Felix Neureuther came back after the first run to edge Andre Myhrer of Sweden by 0.05 of a second in a World Cup event.

headline.print_headline: German Spurts From Fifth to First in Slalom in Japan
headline.main: German Spurts From Fifth to First in Slalom in Japan

snippet: Felix Neureuther came back after the first run to edge Andre Myhrer of Sweden by 0.05 of a second in a World Cup event.
abstract: Winter Sports Roundup; Felix Neureuther wins men’s World Cup slalom in Yuzawa, Japan; other winter sports results noted.
